newsitem.title: USA: Bolero to nominate five to Baldwin board.
newsitem.headline: Bolero to nominate five to Baldwin board.

text.p: Bolero Investment Group LP said Friday it will nominate five people for election to Baldwin Piano & Organ Co's board of directors.
In a letter to Baldwin shareholders, Kenneth Pavia, general partner of Bolero, urged holders to vote for Bolero's candidates.
Last September Bolero asked Balwin to hire an investment banker to explore a possible sale, merger or business combination of the company.
Baldwin hired an investment banker in February, Bolero said.
Pavia and Bolero hold an 8.2 percent stake in Balwin.
